refinebio_platform: Affymetrix Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Array (hgu133plus2)
refinebio_specimen_part: pc-3 human prostate cancer cell line
characteristics_ch1_cell type: PC-3 human prostate cancer cell line
contact_department: Center for Translational Research and Molecular Biology of Cancer
contact_institute: Cancer Center and Institute of Oncology
data_processing: The CEL files were pre-processed using the GC-RMA algorithm available in R environment as the Bioconductor gcrma package.
description: PC-3 prostate cancer cells  exposed to experimental cycling hypoxia (interchanging 1% and 21% oxygen) for 72 h, biological replica 1
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was isolated using Rneasy Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
growth_protocol_ch1: The human cancer cells were grown in CO2 incubator at 37C in the following culture media: PC-3 - RPMI (Sigma-Aldrich) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco BRL), SK-OV-3 - McCoys medium (Sigma-Aldrich) supplemented with 10% FBS (Gibco BRL), WM793B - 2% Tu medium (Sigma-Aldrich) supplemented with 2% FBS (Gibco BRL), bovine insulin (0.005 mg/ml) and 1.68 mmol/l CaCl2 (Sigma-Aldrich).
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 16 g of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Array (Affymetrix). GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
label_protocol_ch1: Total RNA (5 g) was used for synthesis of double stranded cDNA according to manufacturer's instructions. Half of the cDNA volume was used for synthesis of biotynylated cRNA with reagents recommended by Affymetrix.
scan_protocol: Arrays were scanned by GeneChip Scanner 3000 and the data was acquired using GCOS 1.2 software (Affymetrix).
source_name_ch1: PC-3 cells exposed to cycling hypoxia
title: PC_C1
treatment_protocol_ch1: Hypoxic conditions were introduced by incubating the cells in 1% oxygen using oxygen flow-regulated incubator for 72 h (chronic hypoxia) or for 4/12 hour periods of 1% oxygen interchanged with periods of 21% oxygen (cycling hypoxia). Control cells were cultured in standard conditions (21% oxygen) for 72 h.

data_processing: The CEL files were pre-processed using the GC-RMA algorithm available in R environment as the Bioconductor gcrma package.
description: SK-OV-3 ovarian cancer cells exposed to experimental chronic hypoxia (1% oxygen) for 72 h, biological replica 3
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was isolated using Rneasy Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
growth_protocol_ch1: The human cancer cells were grown in CO2 incubator at 37C in the following culture media: PC-3 - RPMI (Sigma-Aldrich) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco BRL), SK-OV-3 - McCoys medium (Sigma-Aldrich) supplemented with 10% FBS (Gibco BRL), WM793B - 2% Tu medium (Sigma-Aldrich) supplemented with 2% FBS (Gibco BRL), bovine insulin (0.005 mg/ml) and 1.68 mmol/l CaCl2 (Sigma-Aldrich).
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 16 g of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Array (Affymetrix). GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
label_protocol_ch1: Total RNA (5 g) was used for synthesis of double stranded cDNA according to manufacturer's instructions. Half of the cDNA volume was used for synthesis of biotynylated cRNA with reagents recommended by Affymetrix.
scan_protocol: Arrays were scanned by GeneChip Scanner 3000 and the data was acquired using GCOS 1.2 software (Affymetrix).
source_name_ch1: SK-OV-3 cells exposed to chronic hypoxia
title: SK_H3
treatment_protocol_ch1: Hypoxic conditions were introduced by incubating the cells in 1% oxygen using oxygen flow-regulated incubator for 72 h (chronic hypoxia) or for 4/12 hour periods of 1% oxygen interchanged with periods of 21% oxygen (cycling hypoxia). Control cells were cultured in standard conditions (21% oxygen) for 72 h.
